::Firearm/Kluster::

"Hey, Kluster!" Firearm says loudly, walking up to Kluster, "The Preds ran 
off. Didn't even give us time to get warmed up!"

Kluster nods, looking around. His eyes narrow as he sees Deemos near the 
ship. He motions to Firearm, the two Maximals walking over to Deemos, their 
guns ready.

"May we help you?" Kluster asks.
